scripts.wabt: bash -c '[[ -d test/wabt ]]' || (git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/WebAssembly/wabt test/wabt && cd test/wabt && make gcc-release-no-tests)
scripts.clone-spec: rm -rf test/spec && cd test && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/WebAssembly/spec
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run wabt && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && npm run clone-spec && node test/main.js
